com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class SmartApplication.I18N

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartApplication.I18N
  • Enclosing class:
    SmartApplication

    protected static final class SmartApplication.I18N
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains various attributes in order to have the default dialog boxes related to exceptions i18ned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartApplication.I18N

        public SmartApplication.I18N(java.lang.CharSequence dialogBoxErrorTitle,
                     java.lang.CharSequence businessObjectAvailabilityProblemHint,
                     java.lang.CharSequence serviceProblemHint,
                     java.lang.CharSequence connectivityProblemHint,
                     java.lang.CharSequence connectivityProblemRetryHint,
                     java.lang.CharSequence otherProblemHint,
                     java.lang.String applicationName,
                     java.lang.CharSequence reportButtonLabel,
                     java.lang.String retrievingLogProgressMessage)
        Parameters:
        dialogBoxErrorTitle - the title that will be used when the framework displays an error dialog box
        businessObjectAvailabilityProblemHint - the body of the error dialog box when the business objects are not available on an Activity
        serviceProblemHint - the body of the error dialog box when a service is not available on an Activity
        connectivityProblemHint - the body of the error dialog box a connectivity issue occurs
        connectivityProblemRetryHint - the body of the error dialog box a connectivity issue occurs, and that a "Retry" button is displayed
        otherProblemHint - the "Retry" button label of the dialog box when a connectivity issue occurs
        applicationName - the name of the application, used when logging an unexpected problem
        reportButtonLabel - the "Report" button label displayed in the dialog box when an unexpected problem occurs
        retrievingLogProgressMessage - the message of the toast popped up when preparing the unexpected problem log e-mail
